DOC.brief_title: Tamsulosin Phase III Clinical Trial -Double-Blind , Placebo Controlled Study Male Patients With Lower Urinary Tract Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Patients urination disorder accompany apparent organic neurologic abnormality ( low urinary tract syndrome : LUTs ) . Patients urination disorder accompany apparent organic ( benign prostatic hyperplasia : BPH ) neurologic abnormality , active urinary tract infection , severe cardiovascular , hepatic and/or kidney complication .
